products.product_name: Believe Diapers Size 1 (8-14Lbs) Viscose Bamboo Diapers 60 Count – Natural Baby Diapers, Chemical Free Natural Diapers for Sensitive Skin, Super Absorbent Clean Diapers, Unscented Plain White Diapers

reviews.name: Ksenia
reviews.title: Soft and keeping it all inside
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2024
reviews.review: I really love how soft these are, but also very clean.

reviews.name: Hochie111354
reviews.title: Diapers are all white with only word Believe on tabs
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2024
reviews.review: Needed an all white diaper to make a diaper cake for a surprise pregnancy announcement to close friends & family of my son & daughter in law

reviews.name: Lauren S
reviews.title: BEST Diapers On The Market!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2021
reviews.review: Literally the BEST diapers I have ever used! We’ve tried other brands and nothing compares to Believe! They don’t leak at all, they don’t make my daughter have a diaper rash and they are so soft and comfy. I love how they fit a bigger in size than Huggies or Pampers which makes more room for her chunky legs and tummy without having her feeling squeezed or causing leaks or diaper rash. We subscribed to a subscription via their website and got a free pack of wipes with every order. Great value for the money!! Also I love how Believe company donates diapers to families in need with every purchase. Great cause and outstanding product! Will forever be a customer!

reviews.name: Cara Fallon
reviews.title: Great!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2024
reviews.review: These were great, soft and gentle. I bought a few packs for newborn size and they are fantastic.

reviews.name: Greywolfwild
reviews.title: OBSESSED!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.review: Two kids and 20 diaper brands later, I found these and they are absolute luxurious heaven. They are So Soft, lightweight but durable. No leakage yet, even when my little had diarrhea. The diapers also don’t smell either (some all natural diapers amplify the pee smell). I love that these are an all natural brand with stellar functionality. I cannot say enough positive things about them.

reviews.name: Yohana B.
reviews.title: Natural
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024
reviews.review: I can’t get enough and continue buying these diapers I am obsessed. Literately!

reviews.name: Melanie
reviews.title: No leaks!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.review: I’ve tried probably 10 different brands of diapers. My LO always had leaks at night even when I sized up. I’m happy to say that when he wore this brand he never had any leaks! The design and fit are way different and better. I try to stick to true non-toxic brands. This one takes the cake

reviews.name: Domine` Fit to the Core Personal Training and Nutrition Consultant
reviews.title: Absorbent, soft, quality diapers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.review: I’m obsessed with coterie diapers but I wanted to try one of the top cleanest diapers and this wa son the list. These are super soft. Absorbent compared to the other clean diapers I’ve tried! The material feels nice and durable for how clean they are. Love them

reviews.name: kendra vandenbos
reviews.title: Yes! Thank you Believe
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.review: I use disposable diapers when I'm on the go. At home I use disposable diapers. I care a lot about ingredients/products. Especially anything that sits on the skin (just a big ole absorbing organ). I was surprised to see reviews saying runs small. I was getting 3's and went down to 2 for this brand. I'd say runs big. My baby is 17.6 lbs and 2 still fits great.

reviews.name: jypq
reviews.title: Needs to be packaged in a box when sending.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.review: Great diapers….But can you package them in a box 📦???? It’s very unprofessional and the package around the diapers gets dirty.

reviews.name: matt
reviews.title: We love these! Little pricey but worth it
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2024
reviews.review: Great diaper!

reviews.name: Nilou
reviews.title: The best diaper
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.review: I absolutely love these diapers for my son. We have tried other bamboo diapers but these are the best. Super super soft and absorbent. I only buy believe brand now!

reviews.name: shawn
reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.review: Perfect for my needs

reviews.name: Kelly J Bender
reviews.title: All around great
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.review: Didn’t have any issues with leaks or blow outs. Liked the fit and the price. No issues or sensitivity with babies skin

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.review: Used them for 7.5 months so far, but we always went size up to make sure it’s dry.

reviews.name: Bridget
reviews.title: SOFTEST DIAPER EVER
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
reviews.review: These are seriously the softest diapers available. The price is very, VERY fair!

reviews.name: BD
reviews.title: Eco-Friendly, Plant-Based, Compostable Diapers with Giving Program and Does its Job!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.review:
UPDATED Review on (07/01/21):
You are looking at this review because you searched for compostable, and plant based disposable diapers, so you already know the stuff it’s made of. So, I will just tell you how they look, feel, and work.

There are a few companies out there doing this, so my comparison is with those and not the non-eco-conscious brands. They are on the softer side. Comfortable too. I haven’t seen any irritation and we are almost done with the 35 pack we got. Initially I thought the wetness indicator wasn’t there because it is so faint and made of three lines instead of a one solid stripe, but it is there, and it works. It does not come with any prints other than Believe written on the top. Size is true to fit. Tabs are good quality as well. The major plus is stretchable waistband and its very obvious unlike other brands when you pull on it. And the last but certainly not least, they have lasted for four plus hours when we went to the beach and forgot to change it soon after we arrived there, so it does its job. We haven’t tried it for overnight though just yet.

Two downsides are, the tabs are not as longer as other brands, they only come around the side a tad bit, I don't think its an issue but having used other brands and having longer tabs that essentially meet half way around, I feel more secure that there is a less chance of blow out. Not that these haven't prevented blow outs but something I noticed that bothered me. Second is their price point is tad bit higher than your Honest brand and some other big brand which I expected but maybe it will come down in future as they do more business.

I also like the fact that they have 1-to-1 matching program of diapers to a US family in need through Good+ Foundation.

Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - It's an Amazon program where many everyday things you buy will generate a small donation from Amazon to the charity of your choice at no cost to you. Info here: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/about/ref=smi_se_rspo_laas_aas

reviews.name: Ka
reviews.title: I FOUND THEM!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.review:
I got my first pack from a food pantry. I was a bit skeptical, but I gave them a try because they looked similar to a brand that has been highly advertised right now.
These are by far hands down THEE BEST DIAPER EVER! Plus they were free! I went back to the food pantry to see if they had anymore, they did not! 😩 so I moved on to (a brand that shall not be named) diaper explosions, etc.
with my fingers crossed I decided to just look on Amazon and I am sooooooo glad I did!
This is a blessing from the gods!

reviews.name: asterisk
reviews.title: Ultra soft, absorbent. Wetness indicator doesn't work?
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.review:
These are the softest diapers we've used – both inside and outside. The inside is so smooth it’s almost shiny. It does a good job with absorbency. No leaks from a very active kiddo. The waistband has a lot of elastic in the back, compared with other brands. These fit my kid well at the waist and leg openings.

The wetness indicator doesn't seem to work. There are 3 faint yellow lines, but they never changed color when wet. This isn't a big deal for me, as I usually check by feel, but my partner likes to actually look and see if it's changed color.

I do like that this company donates a diaper to a family in the US for every diaper bought. That's pretty awesome.

These say "Crafted in NYC, Made in China." I did a little research and it seems a lot of the eco-friendly diapers are made overseas. Even the bigger brands like Honest Diapers. So overall I'm pleased with these. If you're in the market for eco-friendly, sustainable diapers, give these a try.

reviews.name: L
reviews.title: Not your typical diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.review: Ok so let’s start with the fact that it’s already earned a star by the fact it’s a diaper match, for every diaper purchased it donates diaper to child in need! That is completely amazing and melts my heart. Now this is eco diapers and absolutely comfortable, it is top notch quality and made for babies sensitive skin. Honestly fits perfect for my son, this are size 2 and my son is full fit in size one so this size 2 has room but it’s expected as he still growing, they are sized great and have no issues with that. Angel soft material, baby has no rush or any problems with this diapers. They are fabulous and super gentle on little baby’s skin, i as a mom love them and would recommend for any tiny little human!

reviews.name: Tim
reviews.title: Deep, max stretch, soft
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.review: This pack of 42 diapers is eco-friendly and are made from bamboo. We tried the size 3 which is for 16 to 20 pounds. The diapers are soft on the outside and inside. They have very good stretch on the back and sides of the legs. I like that they are deeper on the inside so they do a good job at retaining liquid and holding in solids. They are lightweight and not bulky. However they do absorb well. They are very soft and don’t have any sort of plastic feel to them. They also do have the wetness indicator. They are a very gender neutral diaper. They simply have the word BELIEVE on the front and they are white in color. I would consider these to be some of the better diapers we have tried. They work well and absorb well. I like them more than Luvs diapers. They are better like Huggies or Pampers.

reviews.name: FSUmommy
reviews.title: Great for sensitive booties
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
reviews.review: I read reviews about these running small so went to size 5 for my petite 2 year old. The sizing was perfect so I’d suggest sizing up one if between two sizes. These have pretty decent absorbency and comparable to our normal brand of Pamperss Pure. They are a little thin, but still seemed to work well for overnight wear and daytime. They do start sagging a bit if you go to long without changing diaper and diaper is really wet. The material is soft and I love that there are no chemical in these- they have no diaper smell like some brands have. Great for sensitive booties!

reviews.name: Bev
reviews.title: works well
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2021
reviews.review: If you have a baby you gotta have diapers. Diapers that fit well and don't leak is a must. No one wants to deal with a leaking diaper. These fit really well and do not gap. They hold up overnight without us having to change the bed sheets.

reviews.name: Jennifer Diane
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
reviews.review: I really like these diapers. We mostly use cloth diapers but like to have some disposables on hand for busy seasons when it's hard to stay on top of the laundry or when we're traveling. These are super absorbent and we had no leaks while using them. They also don't have the weird smell that some other name-brand diapers have in order to cover up the pee smell. These are pretty odorless and I also don't notice a strong bad smell from the soiled diapers. Would definitely order again!

reviews.name: E&E0715
reviews.title: Awesome diapers!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
reviews.review:
These diapers fit well. They're nice and absorbent too. We love that they have velcro instead of tape and are soft like cloth rather than sort of plastic feeling.
Highly recommend. They are great for the environment too!

reviews.name: Jeanette
reviews.title: Friendly to Mother Earth
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.review: I always felt a bit of guilt using disposable diapers. These Believe diapers make me feel so much better. I love the sustainable materials. Plus they are soft and absorbent. No irritation whatsoever on my baby’s skin. They match size to size with other brands I’ve used.

reviews.name: K. B.
reviews.title: Recommended diaper if you're looking for a eco-friendly alternative
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2021
reviews.review: These are the best eco-friendly diapers I've used (my baby has really). it has also the color signal when diaper is wet and it works quite fast, even faster than other brands we've used. The size is good, bigger than Huggies, much more comfortable, more similar to Pampers pure version.

reviews.name: Amazon CustomerLiz
reviews.title: new parent's very happy
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.review: New mom is thrilled with the product. Being eco friendly is very important to the parents and it delivers.

reviews.name: Ang
reviews.title: Great diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2021
reviews.review: Love them the only thing I’d change is the elastic in the back, making it more elastic

reviews.name: Elizabeth Leal
reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
reviews.review: Great diapers that are sooo soft and cozy for baby! Love this product! The size is slightly off but still fine and worth it. Clean product

reviews.name: RA
reviews.title: Luxurious diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.review: As a momma that has tried various nontoxic brands, this one is definitely my favorite. They’re so plush & heavy duty + one of the best nontoxic clean diapers out there. Definitely on the more pricey side but worth it in my opinion. Highly recommend for mommas.

reviews.name: Ry Chris
reviews.title: Gets the job done well
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2024
reviews.review: I've tried a few different brands of disposables and they have the best fit. I love the extra scrunch the waste which makes the stay on well and help prevent leakage.

reviews.name: RA
reviews.title: Luxurious diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.review: As a momma that has tried various nontoxic brands, this one is definitely my favorite. They’re so plush & heavy duty + one of the best nontoxic clean diapers out there. Definitely on the more pricey side but worth it in my opinion. Highly recommend for mommas.

reviews.name: Maria
reviews.title: Good
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.review: The diapers are not smelly and absorb well. The only reason I rate them 4 stars is because for some reason my baby had a rash so the time I was using them.

reviews.name: K. Valero
reviews.title: Good diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.review: These diapers worked well for my baby. They are a much cheaper alternative which is why I tried them in the first place. The only issue I had with these was the sizing. I ordered newborn diapers which were too big for my child. They fit on her like a size two would. Keep that in mind when ordering these diapers.

reviews.name: Briana N.
reviews.title: Great amazing diapers BUT NEED TO ADJUST HOW YOU FASTEN OR IT WILL LEAK
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2024
reviews.review:
Really amazing soft clean diapers. I had to do trial and error figuring out how to stop pee leaks. Eventually I did!

They need to be wrapped as an overlap (kind of how you would overlap a swaddle) you dont just close the diaper, you need to tuck over and in (like how you swaddle baby) the edge piece's to avoid leaks!

They should have instructions to package for parents bc its easy but took a few diapers to figure out.

Besides that amazing!!!!!

reviews.name: Prime Cat
reviews.title: Size 1 similar to Pampers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.review: I have a newborn that has outgrown NB size in Pampers brand and can't quite fit size 1. When I got these I found that the size is similar to size 1 from Pampers, only slightly looser fit and excess fabric all around so I'd say it's on the bigger side when comparing the two. The material is soft and there is a wetness indicator that shows through multiple thin lines versus a thick single solid line like other major brands of diapers. My newborn wet this diaper almost minutes after changing and it seemed to absorb just fine like any other diaper but I found the fluff of the inner material a bit on the thin side and not sure if this makes my baby comfortable or not. I'd like to think the fluffier, the better. These are printed with the word "Believe" on the front but is off centered and centered on the waistline on some. and no other design so it's really a simple, basic diaper.

reviews.name: Oceania
reviews.title: Good option
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2021
reviews.review: I took off a star for the fit, they really do run a bit too small. Otherwise the inner is super soft and they don’t leak. My daughter typically soaks through three overnight diapers in a row after she wakes in the morning. These have held up really well and I am impressed by that. No rashes, either!

reviews.name: Jam
reviews.title: Runs Small!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
reviews.review: So glad I was warned by others that these run small so I didn’t wait too long to use them. These diapers definitely run one size smaller than what they say they are. Not sure why they run so small, but they do. As far as the diapers go, they are nice quality and very absorbent. I’ve only tried these during the day, but there were no blowouts. Also, the feel of these is very soft and there are no rashes to report. I love the fact that these diapers are biodegradable. Makes me feel a little less wasteful. Overall, I think the quality of these Believe Diapers is great…I just don’t trust the sizing and am hesitant to take that gamble in the future.

reviews.name: FL Kayaker
reviews.title: Love a lot of things about these
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2021
reviews.review:
Review for: Believe Diapers - Eco-Friendly Disposable Baby Diapers - Made with Sustainable Bamboo & Natural Plant-Based Material

These diapers have good absorbency and they are soft. I appreciate what this company stands for and I love that the diapers are not full of chemicals and scents. They have a wet line and elastic at the back of the waist.

I do have an issue with the fit though and that is the short flaps. I think the waist size runs small for the diaper size but that problem could be eliminated with just having longer flaps. That would make this a better diaper. Luckily, I got a size up but even at that, I can see the need for longer tapes.

reviews.name: Emily J. Morris
reviews.title: One of our better natural diapers
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021
reviews.review: I have always been intrigued by natural/compostablee diapers. While I'm not sure I'm ready to compost this bunch, I am impressed by the quality and fit. They are amazing soft, on par and better than many diapers I've tried out on my kiddos. I love the soft white look, which is simple and won't be an awkward cartoon pattern, and the absorbancy, while not the greatest, is very respectable. I agree they size a bit on the smaller side, I think due to what I find to be a snugger cut, but I also find it does well for leak prevention and fitting. I have not dealt with any rashes or strange diaper odors (other than the usual). If you like natural diapers, these are an excellent choice.

reviews.name: comfort writing
reviews.title: Almost cloth like!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.review:
Soft diaper, cloth like feel. I do feel like it does absorb well, didn’t have too much problem with leakage. The only complaint i have is that you can really smell urine on the first round of pee.

I love the word “Believe” on the diaper! Although it would be really neat if the words changes up from diaper to diaper! Cute idea though!

reviews.name: JonAndFamily
reviews.title: Softest diaper ever but possible sizing issues.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.review: I like those bamboo baby towels for drying kids off. This is much like those and feels so soft inside of it. However it's longer than I'm used to for the same size, and the elastic band doesn't go as far around, so it's like it's made for tall babies and not chubby ones. I'm able to fit it on my son though, so I'm happy with it.

reviews.name: district12girl
reviews.title: Changing line …
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.review: These work very well and the company seems to want to spread the love with their diaper program. All in all these absorb well. The changing line only changes color sometimes tho.

reviews.name: JonAndFamily
reviews.title: Softest diaper ever but possible sizing issues.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.review: I like those bamboo baby towels for drying kids off. This is much like those and feels so soft inside of it. However it's longer than I'm used to for the same size, and the elastic band doesn't go as far around, so it's like it's made for tall babies and not chubby ones. I'm able to fit it on my son though, so I'm happy with it.

reviews.name: district12girl
reviews.title: Changing line …
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.review: These work very well and the company seems to want to spread the love with their diaper program. All in all these absorb well. The changing line only changes color sometimes tho.

reviews.name: Esteban
reviews.title: Meh
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.review: We tried a bunch of different brands of plant based diapers (I think maybe 5 or 6 brands) and this was unfortunately our least favorite. It was easily the softest so we had high hopes, but these were the only diapers wear our daughter had leaks. Though to be fair, we think she probably pees more then the typical baby. So if your baby doesn’t pee a lot each time, this could be an option?

reviews.name: Cameron Hamade
reviews.title: They are okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.review: While I love the idea of “clean” diapers, these have a high rate of leaks/blow outs for us. I would say every 2 to 3 diapers we wore we would leak out the side or top of the back. I do love that they are a cleaner brand! But unfortunately I personally will be going with another brand of diapers due to the mess

reviews.name: Aaron Lawson
reviews.title: Too wide
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.review: Love that this product is natural. Unfortunately the cut of the diaper is very square and too wide so it doesn’t fit snuggly and causes leakage

reviews.name: Michael Mathies
reviews.title: Doesn't hold up
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2021
reviews.review:
The only think I liked about the pampers was my daughter wasn't allergic to it.
Dislikes...
The front was wider than the back which made it difficult to fit properly. It didn't hold the urine, leaks through so had to change her clothes each time on the overnight. When back to Dyper brand it more expensive but it holds up and no leakage

reviews.name: mel
reviews.title: Did not like how they fit
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.review: I wanted to really like these they are soft but I did not like how they fit. The straps are super short I couldn’t get the to stay on.

reviews.name: C. Teleki
reviews.title: Not a Believer!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
reviews.review:
I tried the size 5 on my 2 1/2 year old, who normally wears a size 4. There is plenty of room in the rise but the waist is tiny. He’s not a chubby bellied child by any stretch!
So I tried it on my 1 year old, who usually wears a size 3. The rise is way too much diaper but the waist is tight. So I compared it with the Huggies little mover size 3 and found that the size 5 in Believe has about 2” less stretch in the back waistband than the Huggies size 3!! That accounts for the inability to fit it on either of my diaper wearing guys.
It’s too bad because they are really soft and probably would be really comfortable if the waist fit properly. Total miss on the design of these diapers - maybe they will realize and fix the issue!

reviews.name: S.C.
reviews.title: Run small
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.review:
PROS
- Soft, good for baby skin

CONS
- Runs small --- I haven't been able to use this with my baby because it run that small that it didn't fit her at all and we ended up gifting this away. I was told it absorbs well but I cannot really confirm this. --- Definitely order one or two sizes up.

reviews.name: Amazon Customer
reviews.title: Coterie copycat
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2024
reviews.review: Copied coterie design but didn’t copy the quality. These diapers are lower quality/feel but almost similar price. Will not buy again

reviews.name: Family
reviews.title: Leak
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
reviews.review: I’ve never had a diaper leak so much. They aren’t bad for during the day but they definitely are not a good nighttime diaper. I went out and bought a different brand after 3 nights of using them. Like another comment said you can feel the moisture on the outside of the diaper. Won’t buy again.

reviews.name: Katherine
reviews.title: Okay
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2024
reviews.review: Tried to find a alternative to Coterie & Kudos that doesn't break the bank & really wanted to like these, but they're not it. These are the only diapers my baby has had blowout leaks with! Bummer. Pretty soft, does have a weird back on the diaper, fine for pees, not great for poops.

reviews.name: Alexa
reviews.title: Soft, don't absorb a lot, runs big, every poop blow out the legs
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.review:
The diapers are really soft and feel nice. They run big, for a skinny baby they aren't ideal.

Onto the bad:
-They don't absorb well at all. I change every 2-3 hours or sooner if baby is awake and wet.
-every poop unless small is a blowout. No matter how the diaper is adjusted, placed, etc. baby has skinny legs and this trend to be the location of leaks every time.

reviews.name: Mark Albertson
reviews.title: Soaks right through the outside layer
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.review: These diapers were horrible. If I could give 0 stars I would. The pee soaked right through the outside layer of the diaper after 2 hours of wearing. What is the point a diaper if it’s permeable? I was super disappointed.

reviews.name: Trisha Monesi
reviews.title: SO. MANY. LEAKS.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.review: My son is well within weight range for size 3 Believe diapers. I’ve given them so many chances but they consistently leak after more than one pee and the sizing is terrible. Will not buy again.

reviews.name: M😋🌞
reviews.title: Super small, poor quality
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
reviews.review: Very poor quality and the sizing is terrible. The diapers run so small, no stretch at all.....I've tried Seven generation, eco pea, happy little camper, joonya, made of, Abby & Finn, bamboo nature and eco boom and this brand is definitely too small..

reviews.name: April
reviews.title: 0/10 stars
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2025
reviews.review: If I could give these less than a one star I would… I’ve used these diapers two times and both of the times she’s leaked through the side. Please please please save your money!!!

reviews.name: Lauren Murray
reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2024
reviews.review: They fit great but do not absorb at all. Pee goes right through and poop goes right up the back

reviews.name: Lauren Petre
reviews.title: Just terrible
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.review: These diapers have horrible absorption. Just within the first three days of using these diapers, my little one had two blowouts and a pee leak out. This never happens with Pampers. Would not recommend these in the slightest.

reviews.name: Greg E
reviews.title: Constant Leaks
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.review: Not sure if these require some special tequnique but they would blow out most of the time for us. Yes, most of the time :[
